mapper.sql: ID, FAMILY_NUMBER, CHECK_WATER_METER_REASON, TRANSACTOR, TRANSACTOR_MOBILE, ID_CARD_IMAGE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ENABLED, DEL_FLAG
mapper.insert: insert into t_check_water_meter (FAMILY_NUMBER, CHECK_WATER_METER_REASON, TRANSACTOR, TRANSACTOR_MOBILE, ID_CARD_IMAGE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ENABLED, DEL_FLAG) values ( #{familyNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkWaterMeterReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transactorMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCardImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(),now(), #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},1,0)
mapper.select: select FAMILY_NUMBER,TRANSACTOR,TRANSACTOR_MOBILE from t_check_water_meter where TRANSACTOR_MOBILE = #{transactorMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLAG = 0
